title: Sound On: ‘Operation Warp Speed’ For Oil Production
itunes:title: Sound On: ‘Operation Warp Speed’ For Oil Production
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Joe spoke with Congressman Raja Krishnamoorthi of Illinois, Louisiana Senator Bill Cassidy, Joel Rubin, Former Deputy Assistant Secretary of State; Also the co-host of Really American’s new foreign policy podcast “Warning Shot", and Bloomberg Politics Contributor Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
